full_threads.body:
Hey Luke,

Just a quick update to let you know the changes have all been made on the site:
  • Company name updated to TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd
  • Disclosure and general advice statements added at the bottom of the page

Feel free to take a look and let us know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.

Always happy to help

Hi Andy,

Thanks for looping us in!

We’ll go ahead and action those updates as requested.

Luke, appreciate you pulling the details together!

Always happy to help

action.text: Allie Borcena assigned to Adriane Roa

full_threads.body:
Hi Luke,

Thanks for sending this through.

Looping in @Wolf IQ Support to action the updates.

Cheers,
Andy

On Mon, Sep 1, 2025 at 7:16 AM Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au> wrote:
Good morning Andy & Nichole,

Hector has reviewed the website and there are 3 minor changes required. I have summarized these below

  • At the bottom of the website - update from 'TLI Pty Ltd' to 'TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd'
  • Can we place the next two at the bottom of the website as well.
  1. "TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 73 685 540 381) - Authorised Representative Number 1316479, arranges policies for an on behalf of Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company (ABN 84 600 643 034)."
  2. "The information included in this website is general advice only and it does not take into account your objectives, financial situations or needs. Before making a decision, you should consider whether it is appropriate in light of your particular objectives, financial situation or needs. Benefits are subject to the terms and conditions including the limits and exclusions of the insurance policy."

Thanks



Luke Sellars
General Manager - Underwriting
TLI Underwriting

+61 419 906 067

luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au

Level 5, 200 Adelaide Street, Brisbane QLD 4000

From: Kassie Federico <kassie.federico@envest.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, August 26, 2025 5:17 PM
To: Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au>
Subject: FW: TLI website update


Hi Luke,

Hector has completed his review of your website.

Nothing major, just a couple of small tweaks:
  • Full trading name
  • Issuer and distributor notice
  • General advice warning

Hector has provided some examples, however if you have some other ways, you'd like to display the information we can use that.

Hopefully Nic has admin access and can make these updates without needing to go to Wolf IQ

Regards
Kassie

Kassie Federico
Head of Agency Commercial Partnerships
The Envest Group

+61 424 151 750

kassie.federico@envest.com.au

Suite 7.02, Level 7, 207 Kent Street, Sydney, NSW, 2000


Visit: envest.com.au
Follow us:


This e-mail and any attachments are CONFIDENTIAL and may contain legally privileged information. Although The Envest Group believe this e-mail and any attachments to be free of any virus or other defect which may affect your computer, it is the responsibility of the recipient to ensure that it is virus free and The Envest Group does not accept any responsibility for any loss of damage arising in any way from its use.

From: Hector Martinez Blanco <hector.martinezblanco@envest.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, 21 August 2025 3:16 PM
To: Kassie Federico <kassie.federico@envest.com.au>
Subject: Re: TLI website update


Hi Kassie

Please find my comments/feedback in relation to the TLI Website:

  • Noticed at the bottom of the page the business is identified as TLI Pty Ltd, suggesting to change to the business name registered with ASIC which is TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd .

  • Notice the website does not identified the issuer and distributor of the product, some examples that can be used are provided below:

TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 73 685 540 381) - Authorised Representative Number 1316479, arranges policies for an on behalf of Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company (ABN 84 600 643 034).

or

Policies are issued by Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company (ABN 84 600 643 034) and distributed by TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 73 685 540 381) - Authorised Representative Number 1316479.

or

TLI Underwriting Pty Ltd (ABN 73 685 540 381) - Authorised Representative Number 1316479 act as an agent of the Insurer, Berkshire Hathaway Specialty Insurance Company (ABN 84 600 643 034), to distribute insurance policies.


  • Noticed the general advice warning for the website is not added to the page, suggesting the following:

The information included in this website is general advice only and it does not take into account your objectives, financial situations or needs. Before making a decision, you should consider whether it is appropriate in light of your particular objectives, financial situation or needs. Benefits are subject to the terms and conditions including the limits and exclusions of the insurance policy.

All of the above could be added in one paragraph at the end of the page

Reach out if any further queries

Thanks

Hector Martinez Blanco
Head of Risk and Compliance, Agencies
The Envest Group


+61 414 384 902

hector.martinezblanco@envest.com.au

Level 7, 545 Queen Street, Brisbane, QLD, 4000


Visit: envest.com.au
Follow us:

Morning All,

Details to the preprod TLI website below.

Kassie Federico

Sent: Friday, 15 August 2025 1:54 PM
To: Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au>
Cc: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>; Ellie Sharp <ellie.sharp@envest.com.au>; Patrick Miller <pat.miller@tliunderwriting.com.au>; Joy Tatang <joy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: TLI website update


Hi Luke,

No problems at all - the summit is steepest at the top!

We inserted a new image. See below:

Let us know if that works and we'll publish the live site and complete final tests.

Thanks,
Andt

 Luke Sellars

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Friday, August 15, 2025 1:16 PM
To: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>
Cc: Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au>; Ellie Sharp <ellie.sharp@envest.com.au>; Patrick Miller <pat.miller@tliunderwriting.com.au>; Joy Tatang <joy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: TLI website update


Hi Luke and Nichole,

All items are now complete. Here's what's been done:

Website

  1. Updated header text to "Specialised Heavy Motor Insurance you can trust."
  2. Removed "trusted by 500+ transport companies" from both the top and bottom of the homepage.
  3. Replaced the 4 tiles (P&PL, C&F, WC & Fleet) with a single Fleet Insurance tile, using the provided content and adding a transport image.
  4. Updated "Why us" page text to "With decades of combined experience…"
Downloads
  1. Updated the proposal form to have light grey text fields and remain fully interactive/editable.
  2. Ensured all PDFs remain editable, as per your request.
You can check the changes here:

1. TLI Landing Page

2. Downloads Page

Let us know if all good - and we can push these live.


Thanks,
Andy


On Thu, Aug 14, 2025 at 4:52 PM Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au> wrote:
Hi all

Andy - I think you need to help on your side to ensure all PDF's remain editable (we've set this up this way already). If you can action as you did on others sites please. I've attached the prop form again if needed.

Thanks
Nichole

Projects & Brand
The Envest Group

Hi Luke,

Got it - we're actioning the website items now and will confirm as soon as they're done.

Thanks,
Andy


On Fri, Aug 15, 2025 at 5:24 AM Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au> wrote:
Hi Andy,

A few content updates and one previous request I think that was accidently overlooked in deleting the additional tiles we don't offer insurance for.

Website
  • Replace 'Specialised Transport liability insurance you can trust' with 'Specialised Heavy Motor Insurance you can trust'
  • trusted by 500+ transport companies - Delete on both the top of the website and the 2nd time it appears at the bottom of the website
  • We will drop the 4 tiles 'P&PL, C&F, WC & Fleet and replace with one tile 'Fleet Insurance' Content for that tile below
  • Fleet Insurance - 'Protection for your Fleet against accidental damage, theft and third party liability. (tick for all these) -Single policy for multiple vehicles. -Simplified claims process. -Protect your fleet with extensive insurance plans that cover accidents, theft, vandalism and natural disasters -Increased excess options. It may now look a little dull/boring with only 1 tile, can a transport image be inserted next to it?
  • Why us page - Can we replace 'With over a decade' to 'With decades of combined experience in the……'

Downloads
  • @Nichole Valk can you click the claim form and proposal form and review based on the following. Can we get the prop updated and sent to Andy so it has the same light grey colouring for the text fields and make it interactive so brokers can download and complete in the document rather than printing and handwriting?

Thanks



 Luke Sellars
General Manager - Underwriting
TLI Underwriting

+61 419 906 067

luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au

Level 5, 200 Adelaide Street, Brisbane QLD 4000

From: Andy Crebar <andy@wolfiq.com.au>
Sent: Thursday, August 14, 2025 4:24 PM
To: Luke Sellars <luke.sellars@tliunderwriting.com.au>
Cc: Nichole Valk <nichole@envest.com.au>; Ellie Sharp <ellie.sharp@envest.com.au>; Patrick Miller <pat.miller@tliunderwriting.com.au>; Joy Tatang <joy@wolfiq.com.au>
Subject: Re: TLI website update


Hi Luke and Envest Compliance team,

Just a quick note to let you know the updates for the TLI Underwriting site are ready for review:

  1. TLI Landing Page
  2. Downloads Page
We also noticed there wasn't a unique description for Fleet Insurance - it had the same one as Public & Products Liability ("Protection against third-party property damage and bodily injury claims arising from your business operations").

We've updated it to:

Protection for your vehicles against accidental damage, theft, and third-party property damage.

If that works, we can push the changes live. If you'd prefer different wording, just send it through and we'll update it.


Also, if you have links to your socials, we can add those at the same time.


Thanks,
Andy

Hi Luke,

We're in the final QA now, so things are tracking well for you to review. We can have it ready for you either this afternoon or tomorrow morning.

Quick one for you - on the homepage, there's a "Downloads" section. Since we now have a dedicated Downloads page, do you want to keep that section on the homepage or remove it?

Once we have your call on that, we can finalise and pass it to you + Envest.

Thanks,
Andy

Hi Andy,

Can I grab an update on completion date timeline please?

We made our official announcement today, while the two aren't directly tied it would be good to have it live by Friday. We have an Envest compliance team member on standby, once development phase is complete we will review and hopefully come back to you quickly.


 Luke Sellars
